transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji good morning sir.
Executive: Ji good morning mam, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Bas badhiya, aap bataiye?
Executive: Ji mam, main bhi bahut badhiya hun. Mam, ye keh raha tha aapka na ticket open hua tha.
Customer: Ye kya hua?
Executive: Flag mast pole jo hai na.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Ye A rank category se non A rank category mein ho gaya hai.
Right, to uska ek ticket aaya tha mere paas. To aap ek baar apna seller panel open kariye zara aur jo pole ki agar koi buylead ho to aap usme buylead consume kariye.
Customer: Ek minute.
Executive: Ji open kariye.
Customer: Ji kar liya open sir, IndiaMART.
Executive: Haan, isme dekhiye buylead mein jaaiye.
Customer: Ek minute. Ek second, buylead mein, achha.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Buylead mein aa gayi sir.
Executive: Ab isme dekhiye flag mast pole ki koi buylead hai, search kar lijiye upar.
Customer: Ek second.
(silence)
Customer: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, haan ji mam.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji, ek minute, wo flag mast.
Customer: Haan flag road, flag mast to nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Search kar lijiye upar aa rahi hogi, flag mast pole likh ke search kar lijiye aa jayegi.
Customer: Mast pole.
Customer: Outdoor flag poles, ye to 18-19 ghante pehle ki hai.
Executive: Koi nahi mam, abhi sold out to nahi hui na?
Customer: Achha, achha, ek minute.
Customer: Haan, haan, shayad maine ye consume kar liya maine. Ye kya chakkar aa raha hai? Ye isliye kya aa raha hai? Aise consume kara to ye filter gayab ho gaya, kya chakkar hai iska?
Executive: Kya ji?
Customer: Ye kya hai, Rashil?
Executive: Rashil?
Customer: Sikandarabad ki hai ye flag mast pole outdoor of.
Customer: Flag. Nahi aur bhi koi lead aa rahi hai uske alawa?
Customer: Flag mast ki to nahi aur aa rahi koi.
Executive: Flag pole ki, achha ek cheez bataiye flag mast pole aur flag pole alag alag hai ya ek hi hai?
Customer: Flag pole aur flag mast, flag pole to ho gaya aapke jaise indoor pole hote hain na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Brass mein ho gaya, haan aur flag aur flag mast pole hota hai bada.
Executive: To flag mast pole bada hota hai jo outdoor lagta hai, flag pole hota hai jo chhota indoor lagta hai.
Customer: Indoor hota hai, outdoor indoor lagte hain.
Executive: Achha to dono category hain aapke paas?
Customer: Haan dono ki category hai.
Executive: Okay, ek minute.
Customer: Poles vagera bhi to bechte hain na hum.
Executive: Haan flag mast pole ki ek category thi jo aapne consume kar liya na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay, ek minute. Aur bhi to kari maine subah.
Executive: Haan, haan, haan, abhi kari. Abhi 10-15 minute pehle kari.
Executive: Wo 10-15 minute pehle?
Customer: Haan, haan, ye kari hai na maine, kya naam hai dekho. Maine isme flag pole ki bhi kari thi shayad isme.
Customer: Ye hai na indoor national flag stand, Abhishek.
Executive: Achha. Haan. Isse dekhna padega.
Executive: Flag mast pole ka to nahi aa raha hai abhi buylead, ek tha wo aapne consume kar liya hai.
Executive: Achha flag mast pole mein product kaun kaun se hain mam aapke?
Customer: Flag mast mein to pole hote hain na, high mast hota hai 30 meter ka high mast ho gaya. Flag pole ho gaya aur jo ye hote hain na flag stand pole, ye hote hain brass mein, golden mein, matlab brass se ho gaya aapka golden mein, SS mein ho gaya, SS steel mein. Is tarah se hote hain.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Ek minute.
Executive: Ek buylead thi jo aapne consume kar li, theek hai?
Executive: To aap ek kaam kariye, abhi ek to aapne consume kar li hai, halaki wo ticket jo tha wo ek buylead se ek category mein to nahi aayega. To wo kam se kam teen buylead consume karne se ek category.
Customer: Koi issue nahi hai sir. Koi baat nahi jab aayegi to main abhi kar lungi na.
Executive: Haan, main wahi keh raha hun agar matlab agar koi matlab aisi lead hai na jo kam kaam ki bhi ho to aap usko consume kar lena ek baar kyunki abhi category ko hume A rank mein lana hai, theek hai? Baki aap baad mein dekh lena, theek hai?
Customer: Okay, okay, abhi kar lungi.
Executive: Haan, abhi kar lijiyega. Par ek cheez mam, mujhe na ticket close karne ke liye closing dalni hoti hai to jab aap close kar le na teen lead to aap mujhe ek baar message dal dena ya call karke bata dena ki maine teen kar li hain consume.
Customer: Number?
Executive: Number mam yahi hai mera same WhatsApp hai.
Customer: WhatsApp to hai par achha chalo theek hai main is waqt direct call jayegi na?
Executive: Haan direct call jayegi aap chahe call kar dena chahe message kar dena mujhe.
Customer: Theek hai, okay. Theek hai mere isme to IndiaMART help likha aaya hai na.
Executive: Mere number pe?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan actually kya hai na ki Truecaller se fetch kar raha hai wo. Matlab ye professionally number liya hai na maine apne liye.
Customer: Haan, theek hai, okay. Ek ghante baad dikha lena ek ghante baad.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai. Sahi hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's category changed from A to non-A rank.

- Customer is unable to find flag mast pole buyleads.


Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to consume buyleads.

- Explained the difference between flag mast and flag pole.

- Executive asked to consume 3 buyleads to close ticket.


Next Steps: 

- Customer will consume 3 buyleads and inform executive.


Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, flag mast pole, flag pole
